content.rendered:
recruitment

Join our team

Apply online for our job offers at our headquarters, in our regional training centres or on our missions, and find out on this page how to get involved with Bioforce.

  • Responsable des Services Généraux

    Location: Lyon, France
    Apply until: 18 August 2024

    Download

  • Chargé·e des admissions

    Location: Lyon, France
    Apply until: 18 August 2024

    Download

  • Référent·e Eau Hygiène Assainissement – Santé publique – Environnement

    Location: Lyon, France
    Apply until: 18 August 2024

    Download

  • Référent·e RH / Finance en solidarité

    Location: Lyon, France
    Apply until: 18 August 2024

    Download

Join our Trainers’ Network

Apply for an internship

Each year Bioforce welcomes students on accredited programmes for short placements as part of their course or their professional plans. Unfortunately, we are unable to respond to the many unsolicited applications: you can find all our vacancies on this page and apply online.

excerpt.rendered: Apply online to our job offers at our headquarters, in our regional training centres or on our missions, and find out on this page how to get involved with Bioforce.
